3 Points (C, 3)

Toolbar / Icon:
       
Menu: Draw > Circle > 3 Points (C, 3)
Commands: Circle3P | c3

Description:

Draws a circle from three known points on the circle line.

Procedure:

  1. Set the first point on the circle line using the mouse or enter a coordinate in the command line.
  2. Set the second point on the circle line.
  3. Set the third point.
